title: Divisions: Book 1
description: Genevieve Haynes is seeking more than honor when she decides to join the military—she’s out for revenge. The Outlanders have been terrorizing the Divisions for over half a century and Commander McKinley has just declared war. Genevieve is thrust into a life surrounded by allies, foes, and a perpetual headache named Eric. As she adjusts to her new environment, she encounters more trouble than she bargained for, forcing her to reevaluate her friendships and romances. In a society built on lies, the truth has been buried under years of bloodshed and Genevieve is looking to uncover it.
author: Bridget   Foley
